summary:
I am a Singaporean Designer, based in The Netherlands. I seek to give clarity to problems through my design solutions and I enjoy the challenges that come along the way. I love making things and bringing them to life and I do so by combining intuitive creativity and rational strategy to make a difference in the work that I do. 

Thanks to the teachings of amazing mentors and brilliant partners, I was fortunate enough to be honored with a few creative awards, including from D&AD, Cannes Lion, Spikes Asia, Tinta, Kancils, Adfest and recently the youngest woman ever at 24 years old to be honored on Campaign Asia's Women To Watch list alongside 39 C-suite superstars.

But it’s not just a hunger for shiny statues that drives me. It’s the hunger for responsibility; to strive to do better and challenge the status quo because in my world, there are no barriers or excuses, only opportunities to question, think, play, make, do and fail.
treasury_media: [{'url': 'https://www.campaignasia.com/gallery/women-to-watch-2017-meet-the-future-champions-of-change/438885', 'title': 'Women to Watch 2017: Meet the future champions of change', 'description': 'The Herculean, nay, Nüwaen efforts of these pioneers are steadily turning our industry into a more prosperous, open-minded and generally desirable place to work—and not only for women.', 'image': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/sync/C5627AQG6cYkYDDuarQ/articleshare-shrink_1280_800/0/1691993638793?e=1692957600&v=beta&t=it6fudIHqC4pvySf76_KQWhqWli9YfaeFntjjSn_Q9I'}]

awards:
[{'title': '2018', 'description': "I had the opportunity to represent Malaysia in the Young Lotus competition. This was one of the most rewarding moments of my career where I've learnt valuable lessons from the program and also from fellow up and coming young creatives from around the region. 
", 'issuer': 'ADFEST', 'date': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, {'title': '2017', 'description': "CAMPAIGN ASIA: WOMEN TO WATCH 2017
3 years into my career, I am extremely grateful to be one of the youngest nominated alongside 39 other brilliant and immensely talented women who are champions of change in Campaign Asia's Women to Watch list. This wouldn't be possible without the guidance from my mentors and the nurturing people at work for helping me shape my career.  

KANCILS: 2017 YOUNG KANCILS WINNER 
After a crazy all-nighter in a spooky hotel room together with my amazing creative partner, we bagged the Young Kancils award, Malaysia's top honor for young creatives. This marks the first time in the competition's history that a team from Y&R has clinched the award. This was definitely an enlightening and eye-opening experience. ", 'issuer': 'Campaign Asia, Kancils ', 'date': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, {'title': '2016', 'description': "Y&R STRETCH FACTOR: NOMINATED FOR THE HIGH POTENTIAL PROGRAMME 
Nominated to be part of Y&R's Stretch Factor programme, for the highest potential talents in the network globally.

FUTURE SPARKS AWARD 
In 2016, I became the first person to win the Future Sparks Award twice. This time, I was chosen as one of the three Y&R employees across the entire Y&R Asia network for my thought piece on how brands should evolve in the digital era to stay alive. 

D&AD NEW BLOOD: WOOD PENCIL
One of the first projects I've worked on with the immensely inspiring and talented team mates upon arriving in Y&R Malaysia picked up a Wooden Pencil (Also 1 out of the 10 Pencils awarded in the Asia Pacific region) for the D&AD New Blood Awards'​ brief on Design Bridge. D&AD's New Blood Awards is awarded to the industry's most promising young talent who are under 25, or who have been in the industry for 2 years or under.", 'issuer': 'D&AD, Y&R', 'date': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, {'title': '2015', 'description': "FUTURE SPARKS AWARD
Almost a year and a month into my first full time gig after college, I was chosen as one of the three Y&R employees across the entire Y&R Asia network selected for the Future Sparks award for my thought piece on how advertising agencies and brands should approach and solve socio-economical problems.

SPIKES ASIA: YOUNG DIGITAL ACADEMY 
Being part of the academy gave me a fulfilling understanding of the digital creative process where I got the opportunity to learn and interact with the many brilliant minds of our industry. These invaluable experiences and lessons have since then equipped me with better preparations on taking my career to the next phase.

YOUNG GLORY: OVERALL GLOBAL PROFESSIONAL WINNER 
My brilliant teammates and I were fortunate to be named the most consistently creative folks in the world after becoming the first team in Asia to ever win the Young Glory global creative competition, and eventually went on to win more than double the previous points record set in 2012, setting a new record for the competition. Although we joined the competition only in the 2nd round, we decided to take it as a challenge (it just meant we had to work harder), and a chance to stretch our braincells after office hours, working on briefs that ranged from changing the conversation on sex, to Ebola prevention, to taking a stance on genetic testing as well as Artificial Intelligence. 

CANNES LIONS: PRINT LIONS FINALIST & SPIKES ASIA: SHORTLIST
It was a real treat working with and learning from the talented folks at Y&R Singapore and Manila, and an amazing, brave client, as we aimed to do print differently with North Face's Water-powered Lamp Print Ad. It was an even bigger treat to learn that I won my first honour ever at Cannes Lions and Spikes Asia in less than a year of joining the industry. It may not be a Gold Spike or Titanium Lion, but if anything, it made me even more motivated to work harder to do better at the shows next year.", 'issuer': 'Y&R, Spikes Asia, Young Glory, Cannes Lions', 'date': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, {'title': '2014', 'description': "D&AD NEW BLOOD: WOOD PENCIL
My partner and I were honoured to learn that we were the only winners from Asia for D&AD New Blood Awards'​ brief on UK's Sky when we won the receive wood pencil (formerly in-book award) for the brief. D&AD's New Blood Awards is awarded to the industry's most promising young talent who are under 25, or who have been in the industry for 2 years or under.

SPIKES ASIA: YOUNG CREATIVE ACADEMY (SINGAPORE'S REPRESENTATIVE) 
I am grateful to be selected as Singapore's nomination to be one of the 15 most promising young creative talent across Asia to be part of the Spikes Asia Young Creative Academy. I learned a great deal from this eye-opening experience, where I had the opportunity to interact with and learn from some of the beacons of our industry, I'll definitely take these amazing lessons with me as I embark on my journey as a young creative.

CROWBAR AWARDS: 1 GOLD, 2 SILVERS, 2 BRONZES AND SEVERAL FINALISTS
With the guidance of my mentors, I was fortunate to be one of the most awarded young creatives at the student award show, winning 1 Gold, 2 Silvers, 2 Bronzes and a handful of finalists. They're not Lions or Pencils by any measure, but if anything, it has motivated me to work hard to make it in the big leagues.", 'issuer': 'D&AD, Spikes Asia, Crowbar Awards', 'date': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}]
